description: The first tile has to be perfect. I made this one fit like a glove because it makes the rest of the tiles easier to install. Notice that I swipe thin-set off the perimeter of the tile. This stops mortar from getting into the grout joint. This full tile shower video series from start-to-finish is available inside our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 🙌🏽🔥
title: Helpful Vertical Shower Tile Tip - #shorts #homerepairtutor
